title: Joe Biden takes a tumble
brief_description: US President Joe Biden fell off his bike after stopping to greet a group of reporters and members of the public while out for a ride in Delaware. Footage of the incident shared online sparked countless memes that spoofed the presidential pratfall. By splicing together videos, this Twitter user joked that it was former President Trump’s golf shot that caused the tumble.
description: Footage of US President Joe Biden falling from his bike has sparked countless memes spoofing the presidential pratfall. This one splices the original with Donald Trump golfing to suggest the former president is responsible for the fall. It’s a right-wing meme, but there have also been left-wing memes created to criticise Biden’s inability to achieve his more progressive policies. Both sides of politics use memes, but the alt-right, in particular, have weaponised the format’s humour and irony to spread hate.
